method.name: SrcmovToTimeInOut
method.jname: 時系列入出庫予定一覧

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)
arg.param: 時系列入出庫予定一覧

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", 'FM99990.0999') as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_PERIOD\\", 'FM999990') as \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"PROP_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ISSUE_LT\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"MPS_FLG\\" = 1 " +" and(M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = 4 " +" or M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" = 5)"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(sum(T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\"), 'TM9') as \\"STOCK_ON_HAND_QTY\\" " +"from " +" T_ITEM_STOCK " +"where " +" T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_ITEM_STOCK.\\"WH_CD\\" in ( " +" select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" " +" from " +" M_WH " +" where " +" M_WH.\\"MRP_FLG\\" = 1 " +" )"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"MPS_FLG\\" NOT IN (0)"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" IN (4, 5)"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") as \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL " +"where " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ( " +" select " +" M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\" as \\"CAL_NO\\" " +" from " +" M_PLANT " +" where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" )"

"delete from " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_OD.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_OD.\\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\" != 1"

"insert into " +" T_OD(\\"OD_NO\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"ODR_STS_TYP\\", \\"DM_STS_TYP\\", \\"OD_TYP\\", \\"DUE_DATE\\", \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", \\"DM_QTY\\", \\"ODR_QTY\\", \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", \\"ODR_LT\\", \\"FIXED_LT\\", \\"PROP_LT\\", \\"SAFETY_LT\\", \\"ISSUE_LT\\", \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", \\"OD_GNR_TYP\\", \\"OD_LEVEL_NO\\", \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, 1, 0, 2, TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(?,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), 0, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?, 1, 1, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, 0)"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(SYS_PRD_PLAN_PERIOD.\\"PLAN_SPAN\\", 'FM9990') as \\"PLAN_SPAN\\" " +"from " +" SYS_PRD_PLAN_PERIOD " +"where " +" SYS_PRD_PLAN_PERIOD.\\"PRD_PLAN_PERIOD_TYP\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_PRD_PLAN_PERIOD.\\"PRD_PLAN_FINAL_DAY_TYP\\" as \\"PRD_PLAN_FINAL_DAY_TYP\\" " +"from " +" SYS_PRD_PLAN_PERIOD " +"where " +" SYS_PRD_PLAN_PERIOD.\\"PRD_PLAN_PERIOD_TYP\\" = ?"
"update " +" SYS_OD_CALC_CTRL " +"set " +" \\"OD_MNT_FLG\\" = 1 " +"where " +" SYS_OD_CALC_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", 'FM99990.0999') as \\"ITEM_SPOIL\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\" as \\"LOT_SIZING_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_PERIOD\\", 'FM999990') as \\"MAX_PERIOD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MUL_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MAX_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"MIN_ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"SAFETY_STOCK\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ODR_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ODR_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"PROP_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", 'FM99999999999990.0999') as \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_ITEM.\\"ISSUE_LT\\", 'FM999990') as \\"ISSUE_LT\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_NAME\\" as \\"PLANT_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" MAX(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"MAX_CAL_DATE\\", " +" MIN(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\") AS \\"MIN_CAL_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" M_CAL " +"WHERE " +" M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = ( " +" SELECT " +" M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\" AS \\"CAL_NO\\" " +" FROM " +" M_ITEM " +" WHERE " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" )"
"select " +" VALUE " +"from " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"where " +" NAME = 'MAX_DISPLAY_MONTH_MRP'"

"delete from " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_OD.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_OD.\\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\" != 1"

"SELECT " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" AS \\"OD_NO\\" " +"FROM " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_OD.\\"ODR_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_OD.\\"EXTERNAL_DM_FLG\\" != 1 " +"FOR UPDATE NOWAIT"
"SELECT " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'TIME_CTRL'"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(PRD_DUE_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS PRD_DUE_DATE, " +" OD_NO AS OD_NO " +"FROM " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" TO_CHAR(PRD_DUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND OD_TYP = '2' " +" AND ODR_STS_TYP = '1' " +" AND EXTERNAL_DM_FLG != 1"
"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" AS \\"INSTALL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = 'APS*'"
"DELETE FROM " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" T_OD.PARENT_OD_NO = ? " +" AND T_OD.OD_TYP = 3 " +" AND T_OD.DM_STS_TYP = 1 " +" AND T_OD.OD_GNR_TYP = 9 " +" AND T_OD.EXTERNAL_DM_FLG != 1"

"SELECT " +" OD_NO AS OD_NO " +"FROM " +" T_OD " +"WHERE " +" TO_CHAR(PRD_DUE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND ITEM_CD = ? " +" AND PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND OD_TYP = '2' " +" AND ODR_STS_TYP = '1' " +" AND EXTERNAL_DM_FLG != 1 " +"FOR UPDATE NOWAIT"

cell.name: MRP_ODR_NAME
cell.description: 品目手配区分 表示文字列

cell.name: OUTSIDE_NAME
cell.description: 品目内外作区分 表示文字列

cell.name: UNIT_QTY_NAME
cell.description: 在庫数量単位区分 表示文字列

cell.name: LOT_SIZING_NAME
cell.description: ロットまとめ区分 表示文字列

cell.name: FixDemand
cell.description: 一覧 確定デマンド

cell.name: PlanDemand
cell.description: 一覧 計画デマンド

cell.name: OldPlanOrder
cell.description: 一覧 旧計画オーダ

cell.name: h_saveNewPlanOrder
cell.description: 一覧 新計画オーダ(送信用)

cell.name: NewPlanOrder
cell.description: 一覧 新計画オーダ(入力用)
